attributes.action: Instigate legislation in the UK to establish the criminal offence of 'Crime Against Out Society'.
attributes.additional_details: So much of the crime perpetrated nowadays affects a HUGE proportion of our people because the world has changed and so many people are now affected through the World Wide Web.  Benefits Fraud, Tax Evasion, Abuse of NHS Facilities etc are crimes which adversely affect so many members of our society.  For this offence the ONLY possible sentence available to our judiciary MUST be a life means life, life imprisonment sentence.
